item.title: Sysorex Inc 10-K
item.description: Sysorex Inc, which is in the Services-Computer Programming Services [7371] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 29 2021 had 32261 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 511 instances may - 309 instances note - 289 instances 2020 - 263 instances 31 - 257 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
